clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Folic Acid Supplementation on Arsenic Lowering
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of Folic Acid Supplementation Lowering Arsenic in a Chronic, Low-level Exposed Arsenic Population: a Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo Controlled Clinical Trial.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine whether folic acid supplementation are effective on arsenic lowering in a chronic, low-level arsenic exposed population.

detailed_description.textblock:
Outcome measure:
Changes of arsenic metabolites at baseline and week 8
Methods High-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC)

primary_outcome.measure: Change of urine arsenic metabolites between baseline and week 8

clinical_study.condition: Toxic Effect of Arsenic and Its Compounds
